snippet: The week before the Oscars on Feb. 24, several contenders were available via video-on-demand, including “Argo” and “Skyfall.” Each topped the list for movies on demand.
lead_paragraph: The week before the Oscars on Feb. 24, several contenders were available via video-on-demand, including “Argo” and “Skyfall.” Each topped the list for movies on demand.
